compatibility.overview: Personal Month 1 is your time for new beginnings and fresh starts. This month favors launching new projects and taking bold initiatives.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Months 1, 3, and 5 amplify your pioneering spirit with creative energy and adventurous momentum.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Months 7 and 9 provide spiritual insight and humanitarian vision to guide your new ventures.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Months 2, 4, 6, and 8 may feel restrictive to your need for independence and innovation.

compatibility.overview: Personal Month 2 emphasizes cooperation, partnerships, and patience. This is an excellent time for building relationships and working in teams.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Months 2, 4, 6, and 8 support your collaborative nature with stability and structured progress.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Months 7 and 9 add wisdom and compassionate understanding to your diplomatic efforts.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Months 1, 3, and 5 may create tension with their independent and spontaneous energies.

compatibility.overview: Personal Month 3 sparks creativity, self-expression, and social connections. Perfect for artistic projects and expanding your social circle.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Months 1, 3, and 5 fuel your creative fire with leadership energy and freedom of expression.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Months 6 and 9 bring nurturing support and humanitarian purpose to your creative endeavors.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Months 2, 4, 7, and 8 may dampen your spontaneous creative spirit with excessive structure.

compatibility.overview: Personal Month 4 focuses on hard work, organization, and building lasting foundations. Great for systematic progress and practical achievements.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Months 2, 4, 6, and 8 support your methodical approach with cooperation and ambitious goal-setting.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Months 1 and 9 add leadership direction and humanitarian purpose to your diligent work.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Months 3, 5, and 7 may feel too scattered or theoretical for your practical, focused energy.

compatibility.overview: Personal Month 5 brings freedom, adventure, and exciting changes. Excellent for travel, learning, and breaking free from routine.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Months 1, 3, and 5 match your adventurous spirit with leadership courage and creative exploration.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Months 7 and 9 add depth and meaning to your adventures and explorations.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Months 2, 4, 6, and 8 may feel too restrictive or routine-focused for your need for variety.

compatibility.overview: Personal Month 6 centers on home, family, and nurturing responsibilities. Perfect for strengthening family bonds and creating harmony.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Months 2, 4, 6, and 8 support your nurturing focus with cooperation and stable foundations.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Months 3 and 9 add joy and compassionate service to your caring nature.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Months 1, 5, and 7 may feel too independent or detached for your family-focused energy.

compatibility.overview: Personal Month 7 encourages introspection, study, and spiritual growth. Ideal for research, meditation, and inner development.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Months 5, 7, and 9 complement your introspective nature with exploration and spiritual wisdom.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Months 2 and 4 provide gentle support and structure for your contemplative pursuits.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Months 1, 3, 6, and 8 may feel too demanding or externally focused for your need for solitude.

compatibility.overview: Personal Month 8 focuses on material success, business achievements, and financial progress. Great for career advancement and material gains.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Months 2, 4, 6, and 8 support your ambitious goals with cooperation and practical action.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Month 1 adds leadership initiative and pioneering energy to your business focus.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Months 3, 5, 7, and 9 may distract from your material focus with creative or idealistic pursuits.

compatibility.overview: Personal Month 9 emphasizes completion, humanitarian service, and letting go. Perfect for finishing projects and giving back to others.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Months 3, 6, and 9 amplify your compassionate nature with creativity and nurturing service.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Months 1, 2, and 7 add leadership, cooperation, and wisdom to your humanitarian efforts.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Months 4, 5, and 8 may feel too practical or self-focused for your generous, giving spirit.
